description.english: Ask all of Misha's suitors on a second date.
description.french: Invitez tous les prétendants de Misha à un deuxième rendez-vous.
description.german: Bitte alle Dates von Misha zu einem zweiten Date.
description.russian: Пригласите всех ухажеров Миши на второе свидание.
description.schinese: 询问米莎第二次约会的所有追求者的情况。
description.spanish: Pide a todos los pretendientes de Misha una segunda cita.
description.turkish: Misha'nın tüm taliplerini ikinci bir buluşmaya davet et.

description.english: Do not make any connections from Misha's speed dates.

description.german: Mach nach Mishas Speed-Dates keine weiteren Dates.

description.turkish: Misha'nın hızlı buluşmalarından hiç bağlantı edinme.
